headline: Edison International Rated Buy as EV Adoption Leads in Service Area
summary: Edison International (NYSE:EIX) ranks among the 30 stocks expected to beat the market by 20 percentage points this year. UBS reaffirmed its Buy rating and price target of $70 for Edison International (NYSE:EIX) on June 10, as the bank views recent legislative events in California favorably. According to UBS analyst Gregg Orrill, the California Senate […]
